name: Jotform Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Jotform Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Jotform events via webhooks

form.name: form
form.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
form.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default does the webhook-data use internal keys instead of the names. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the keys automatically to the actual names.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: By default does the webhook-data use internal keys instead of the names. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the keys automatically to the actual names. | 默认值: True

onlyAnswers.name: onlyAnswers
onlyAnswers.description: Whether to return only the answers of the form and not any of the other data
onlyAnswers.natural_language_description: 参数名: Only Answers | 作用: Whether to return only the answers of the form and not any of the other data | 默认值: True
